Doctor-led personalised treatment

Eczema

A holistic, doctor-guided treatment program that heals eczema from the root by balancing immunity, reducing inflammation, and restoring the skin barrier naturally.

How It Works
Doctor-led personalised treatment
Natural immune-balancing skin healing

How Our Treatment Works

A medically guided step-by-step plan tailored for this condition.

Internal Homeopathic Healing

Targets inflammation, itching, redness, and immune hypersensitivity from within.

Diet & Gut Repair Therapy

Corrects gut imbalance, food triggers and nutrient deficiencies that worsen eczema.

Lifestyle & Stress Regulation

Minimises flare-ups by managing stress, sleep cycles, and environmental triggers.

What’s Causing This Condition?

We diagnose underlying triggers and address the root causes, not just symptoms.

Immune Overreaction

Eczema is strongly linked to immune hypersensitivity causing flare-ups.

Skin Barrier Damage

Weak moisture barrier leads to dryness, cracks, and itching.

Inflammation

Chronic inflammation under the skin causes redness and swelling.

Allergy Triggers

Dust, foods, soaps, and fabrics can trigger sudden flare-ups.

Stress & Emotional Triggers

Stress weakens immunity and directly increases eczema severity.

Common Symptoms

Symptoms vary from person to person — here are the most commonly reported ones.

Red, inflamed skin

Dry or cracked patches

Severe itching

Fluid-filled bumps

Skin discoloration

Recurring flare-ups

Thickened, sensitive skin

Frequently Asked Questions

Clear answers to the most common questions about our holistic, doctor-guided treatment programs.

Is homeopathy effective for hair fall?

Yes. It treats internal causes such as stress, hormones and digestion for long-term regrowth.

How long before I see results?

Most patients experience fall control within 3–4 weeks and new growth from 5–10 weeks.

Is this treatment safe for women?

100% safe for PCOS, postpartum, thyroid-related hair fall and hormonal imbalance.

How is Modern Clinic different?

We combine Homeopathy, Nutrition and Stress Healing to correct the root cause naturally.
